T02D2082:159a-1: bi sh'a pi krishna mu kha s'a dha nam /
T02D2082:159a-3: sha za kha nag ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2082:159a-4: aom ta ti le ta ti le krishna mu khe
T02D2082:159a-5: ma h'a pi sh'a tsi de hi da d'a hi
T02D2082:159a-6: sv'a h'a / bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig bzlas te /
T02D2082:159a-7: de nas tshes bcu bzhi nas zan lhag ma'i chad
T02D2082:159a-8: bu la sngags lan bdun bzlas shing zla ba gcig
T02D2082:159a-10: nam phyed la bzlas pa mang du bya /
T02D2082:159a-11: de nas tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo thog thag bzlas pa bya /
T02D2082:159a-12: nam phyed dam yang na tho rangs ka 'grub par byed do //
T02D2082:159a-13: nyi ma re re di na ra bcu bcu ster ro //
